about_the_game:
Follow our Scalisco Developer Steam Page (click our developer name above) to get notified when we release more games that donate to help animals and other causes

Become a SUPERCORGI!

Don't let stubby legs stop you! Collect Corgi Butt Power to use ancient corgi superpowers to climb and soar and prove you're not too stubby to make it wherever you wish.

Be a Corgi Unleashed!

Choose your own path around the island and explore your way. Relax at cozy spots, grow your collections, or talk to locals. It's all your choice. You can even toggle the pixelized Nostalgia Mode on or off in the settings of the game!

Teach people to love unconditionally, just like a dog!
You're man's best friend for a reason. Help islanders with their problems, just like dogs do! Show them that they don't have to be attached to the stresses of their minds - be more present, like a dog!

Relax at secret Cozy Spots
Enjoy the serenity of the island’s natural beauty at special cozy spots. Put your controller down and delight in the peaceful music and animations. Maybe now’s a good time to do that work you've been putting off or do some creative journaling or drawing?

Customize Your Appearance
My corgi is Corgster, a Pembroke Welsh good boy. What type of corgi will you be? Tri-color? Blue Merle?, or more? Want Hats, Glasses, or Capes? Yes, please!

Can you pet the dog? Well... you ARE the dog! Let people pet YOU! Boop other dogs you find, too!

Our mission is to give people fun, relaxing ways to help real dogs. We are grateful for our players of our mobile games and merch customers that allowed us to donate to shelters to sponsor rescue dogs! We hope we can do even move with A Corgi's Cozy Hike and appreciate your wishlist and support :) 

Follow our Scalisco Developer Steam Page (click our developer name above) so you know when we release more games that donate to help animals and other causes.

Join our wholesome community on Discord (check the links on the side of the page).

Visit to see our corgi merch and mobile games that also donate to animal shelters. Thank you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: 3 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Em-bark on a therapeutic adventure around a peaceful island. Use Corgi Butt Power to climb and soar your way to tasty treats and cozy nap spots. Relax and savor this bite-sized, open-world experience while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters.
